title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.254 - Trial balance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.254 - Trial balance

State Regulations
A list or abstract of the balances or of total debits and
total credits of the accounts in a ledger, the purpose being to determine the
quality of posted debits and credits and to establish a basic summary for
financial statements. The term is also applied to a list of account balances
(and their total) abstracted from a customer's ledger or other subsidiary
ledger for the purpose of testing their totals with the related control
account. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.254

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
